00020 #include "nettypes.h"
00021 
00022 namespace Network {
00023 
00024 string netProtocolToString(NetProtocol netProtocol)
00025 {
00026     switch (netProtocol) {
00027         case TCP_IP: return "TCP_IP";
00028         case UDP_IP: return "UDP_IP";
00029         case USAR_WC: return "USAR_WC";
00030         case NETPROTOCOL_UNKNOWN: return "?";
00031     }
00032     return "";
00033 }
00034 
00035 NetProtocol stringToNetProtocol(const string& s)
00036 {
00037     if (s == "TCP_IP" || s == "TCP") return TCP_IP;
00038     else if (s == "UDP_IP" || s == "UDP") return UDP_IP;
00039     else if (s == "USAR_WC") return USAR_WC;
00040     return NETPROTOCOL_UNKNOWN;
00041 }
00042 
00043 ConnectionStatus stringToConnectionStatus(const string& s)
00044 {
00045     if (s == "NOT_CONNECTED") return NOT_CONNECTED;
00046     else if (s == "CONNECTED") return CONNECTED;
00047     else if (s == "TRYING") return TRYING;
00048     else if (s == "FAILED") return FAILED;
00049     else if (s == "CONNECTION_RESET") return CONNECTION_RESET;
00050     else return NOT_CONNECTED;  // XXX
00051 }
00052 
00053 string connectionStatusToString(ConnectionStatus status)
00054 {
00055     switch (status) {
00056         case NOT_CONNECTED: return "NOT_CONNECTED";
00057         case CONNECTED: return "CONNECTED";
00058         case TRYING: return "TRYING";
00059         case FAILED: return "FAILED";
00060         case CONNECTION_RESET: return "CONNECTION_RESET";
00061     }
00062     return "";
00063 }
00064 
00065 } // namespace
